t: Chapter 05 Licensure for Dentists Licensed in Another State

c.x: In this chapter, the following terms have the meaning indicated.
“ADEX” means the American Board of Dental Examiners, Inc., or its successor
“ADLEX” means the American Dental Licensing Examination, which includes bot
“Board” means the Maryland State Board of Dental Examiners.
